chara.textHome:
Our Chinese restaurant hasn't been
too well since Dad took it over.

But that hasn't stopped my mom and
grandma from spending money, though...

You see, that's where I,
Tsuruno Yui, come in!

I'm gonna become the mightiest
and help out the business myself!
Training complete!

That was 24 hours straight
standing on one leg!
That was long...more boring than it was hard.
But now, time for the other leg!
Come on, come one, COME ON!
I still haven't peaked!
Yep, I can feel all the progress I've made...
I'm completely sure of that!

Listen! I made a stray cat roll on the ground
and show me its belly just by staring at it!
My powers must be stronger than ever!
I did it!

I just went to the zoo and made
a lion sit down on command!

All I did was stand in front of the cage
and say "Sit!" inside my head!
Now that's mighty!
Hey! I was waiting for you!

All right, let's do this! Now repeat after me!
One, two, three...
"I'm gonna get even mightier today!"
HEY! Shout it with me!
All right! I'm wide awake now! Morning!
I always feel great in the morning.
Once I'm up I'm ready to go full speed!
I'm starrrving! Let's eat some food!

And by food I mean rice, good ol' 
fashioned white rice.
I just love rice!

Oh no, no, no! I've gotta
go help out at the restaurant!

Profits are still falling. Like present participle
falling! So I need to keep at it every day!

I do this thing before going to bed each night.
They're called declarations!
Ready? Watch!

I'm gonna get mightier...
I'm gonna get mightier...
I'm gonna get...Zzz...
The day's over before you even know it.
24 hours isn't that long, you know!

You've gotta make sure you're getting the
most out of every second of your training!

The fate of the Yui Family basically rests on
my shoulders, so that means I need to get
stronger so I can help out even more!
Forgot to breathe...

Yeahhh! THIS!
This is what I wanna do!
I'll fight any enemy, so bring it! COME ON!
I came up with a warmup exercise.
I call it the Tsuruno Set! Ready?

Raise your arms...then punch the sky!
Punch! Punch! 100 reps!

I have my own special trick for fights.
Here, I'll teach you.

First, look into your foe's
eyes. Don't look away...
Then dash in and punch 'em really hard!
Chinese cuisine is food born from the flames.
There's always a fire in my heart!

â€¦Or I wish I could say that, but sometimes
it shrinks into a tiny flicker.

I like the phrase,
"You never know 'til you try!"

It's okay to wing it! If you don't act,
nothing will happen at all!
I love being direct with people.
I HATE when people lie or twist the truth!
I always wanna face things head on!

After fighting with Momoko,
I think of her as a tiger.
And Rena as a wolf.
Kaede?
Kaede's like...
...A hamster?

Believe me, I know.
When I get into something,
I don't see anything else. In other words,
I have amazing powers of concentration!
Right?!

You can tell that Akira-sensei and
Meiyui-sensei are strong at first glance.
No, seriously, you can!

I hope one day I'll get the chance
to learn from them.

Hiiiyah, hiyah, hiyah, hiyah, hiyah, hiyah
hiyah, hiyah, hiyah, hiyah, hiyah, hiiiYAH!
All right, vocal pump up training, DONE!
Let the mightiest win!
I feel like I'm getting even more powerful!
I'm telling ya! I can't lose!
This proves how mighty I REALLY am!

Ya gotta admit it!
Right now I am the mightiest!

I'm gonna become the
Mightiest Magical Girl!
That's why I gotta keep on fighting!
Come on, I'm ready for anyth...
oh, the name's Tsuruno Yui!

Huh?
Looks like I've gotten even stronger!

Ya gotta admit, I'm getting closer...
Feels good!

Woohoo, feels great!
Now this is what I call mighty!
Hoo!
That's 10,000 sit-ups!

I may have become physically stronger
since I became a Magical Girl,
but training is always a must!
All right!

I just did 60 pull-ups in a minute!
That's one every second!
So maybe I could go 3,600 times in 1 hour?
